lines.gurmukhi: swDusMig drsn ko hY inqnymu jw ko soeI drsnI smdrs iDAwnI hY
lines.transliteration_english: Saadhousangi Darasan Ko Hai Nitanaymu Jaa Ko , Soee Darasanee Samadaras Dhiaanee Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: He whoÂ· is regular in seeing and visiting the saintly persons, is the contemplator of the Lord in the true sense. He sees all alike and feels the presence of Lord in everyone.

lines.gurmukhi: sbd ibbyk eyk tyk jw kY min bsY mwin gur igAwn soeI bHmigAwnI hY
lines.transliteration_english: Sabad Bibayk Ayk Tayk Jaa Kai Mani Basai , Maani Gur Giaan Soee Brahamagiaanee Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: He who holds the contemplation of Guru's words as his primary support and lodges it in his heart is the true follower of the Guru's teachings and knower of the Lord in true sense.

lines.gurmukhi: diRsit drs Aru sbd suriq imil pRymI piRA pRym aunmn aunmwnI hY
lines.transliteration_english: Drisati Daras Aru Sabad Surati Mili , Praymee Pria Praym Ounaman Ounamaanee Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: He whose vision is focused on seeing the True Guru and hearing power concentrated on hearing the divine words of Guru, is a lover of his beloved Lord in the true sense.

lines.gurmukhi: shj smwiD swDsMig iek rMg joeI soeI gurmuiK inrml inrbwnI hY ]327]
lines.transliteration_english: Sahaj Samaadhi Saadhasangi Ik Rang Joee , Soee Gurmukhi Niramal Nirabaanee Hai ?327?

Shabad OS B.translation: He who is dyed in the love of one Lord engrosses himself deep meditation of the Lord's name in the company of the saintly persons is truly liberated and a clean Guru-oriented individual. (327)
